1.0.name: wordpress/hey-its-a-flickr-widget
1.0.description: Hey It's a Flickr Widget is, well, a Flickr widget. Simply install it like any other plugin and then use the widget it creates however you'd like. You have total control over the width of the generated images, what account is being accessed, and how many images you'd like to display. No API keys needed!
